name: Hissatsu Pachinko Collection 3
overview: Hissatsu Pachinko Collection 3 ("Sure-Fire Pachinko Collection 3") is a pachinko simulation game from SunSoft and part of their Hissatsu Pachinko Collection series on the Super Famicom, of which this is the third game of four. Hissatsu Pachinko Collection 3 features a credit on its title screen for Nifty Serve, a telecommunications company in Japan, as well as Daiichi, a pachinko machine manufacturer. As with previous games, there is a story mode that has the player moving from their apartment to various pachinko parlors in order to make a fortune.
